events.message: I recently purchased a jacket but I would like to request a refund because it doesn't fit me properly and I am not satisfied with the product.
The system has classified the customer issue as a refund request based on keywords such as refund and dissatisfaction.
A support agent has been assigned to this refund case to assist the customer with their request.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out about your jacket. Iâ€™m here to help you with your refund process. Could you please provide your order number?
To proceed with your refund, could you please share the order number and confirm if the item has been opened or worn?
My order number is 9876543210. The jacket was tried on once but not worn outside. I would like to return it as soon as possible.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate a return shipping label to your email so you can send back the jacket. Upon receipt, we will process your refund promptly.
I appreciate your quick response and prompt solution. I will check my email for the return label and send the item back immediately.
The return label has been sent, and once we receive the jacket, your refund will be processed within 5 business days. Thank you for your cooperation.
Just checking in to confirm if you have sent the jacket back and if everything is on track with your refund. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Yes, I sent the jacket two days ago via the provided label. I am awaiting the refund now. Thanks for following up.
The refund has been processed successfully and the case is now closed. Thank you for your patience and please reach out if you have any other issues.
We have sent you a satisfaction survey to rate your experience with our refund support. Your feedback helps us improve our service.
